preface.title: The Need for Animal Tracking
preface.para: Either for hunting or husbandry human beings have always observed and remembered animal movements. Today with larger herds and more interaction between producers and infrastructure providers more animal movements translates into more information to manage.

Computers, software applications and animal event sensors that sense, record and manage animal movements and histories can ease the information management burden and reduce the cost for farm animal producers and livestock infrastructure providers.
Tracker provides livestock producers and infrastructure providers an effective, low cost solution for managing and exchanging animal premises and event history information.
